ai-vv76:1.2_0: the Supreme Seer, preached the supreme Snakes,
ai-vv76:1.3_0: In just the same way, all of you,
ai-vv76:2.3_0: Whose mind is not developed like this?
ai-vv76:3.1_0: he is pleased with the god.
ai-vv76:3.3_0: It is the fruit of that deed,
ai-vv76:4.1_0: “In humans, I was a human being.
ai-vv76:4.2_0: I gave a poor worker to a poor worker.
ai-vv76:4.4_0: My ethical conduct had been ethical.
ai-vv76:5.3_0: and my complexion was like me.”
